text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking solid with 6 ft @ 7s NNW and fresh 18 mph NNW winds. Balephetrish and Balevullin Bay are your best bets, especially during their prime tides. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 4 ft @ 6s, but still offers some fun at the same spots. By the day after, conditions remain similar with 4 ft @ 6s, but winds ease a bit to 14 mph, making it a bit more manageable. Best: today.
